room_title: Escape room "The Dark Wizardâ€™s Curse" by Escape from Mystery Manor in Boise
room_description: The gift of immortality for many centuries has been a subject of research and aspirations of gifted wizards, But this gift can turn into a curse if it falls into the wrong hands. The Dark Wizard has risen again and threatens to steal the alchemist orb to gain unprecedented power. He must be stopped. The wise and brave students are now the only hope to defeat the Dark Wizard and bring peace once again. Time is limited and you have just one hour before the enemy finds you. Will you dare to take the risk?
